SK Music Records

The Story

Driven by emotion and fueled by sound, this our artists blends raw storytelling with rich melodies to create a deeply personal and immersive musical experience. With roots in indie, folk, and electronic textures, each track is crafted to resonate with listeners across genres.

Artists

Independent artist blending heartfelt lyrics with atmospheric sounds. Creating music that connects, uplifts, and resonates deeply.

Jade Monroe
Nashville country artist known for her heartfelt songwriting and catchy melodies, Jade Monroe is a singer-songwriter whose have made her one of the most exciting new voices in country music. Born and raised...
Synthwave

Echo Drift

R&B/Soul

Sienna Ray

Perfect
Signing with SoundKraft completely changed my career. They believed in my vision, gave me total creative freedom, and backed it with real support.”
Jason O'NeilCEO of SpotPeer
Let your work do the talking
SoundKraft isn’t just a label—it’s a home for artists. They understand sound, brand, and audience better than anyone I’ve worked with.
Rachel KimFreelance Videographer
Designed for creatives
From production to promotion, SoundKraft is on another level. They helped me shape my sound and actually got it heard.
Olivia CarterFounder, Flux Agency
A theme that truly speaks to artists.
SoundKraft took my raw demos and helped me create a record I’m proud of. They know how to polish talent without diluting the soul.
Mia Fernandez Multimedia Artist
Flawless video integration, endless possibilities.
Working with SoundKraft felt like collaborating with real musicians—not just a business. They’re passionate, sharp, and fully tuned in
Daniel PriceLead Producer, Black Frame Films
The perfect blend of design and functionality.
SoundKraft gave my music the platform it needed. They handled everything from mastering to marketing with precision—and never compromised the art.
Alex SimmonsUX/UI Designer, Pixel & Co
